skillTree.name: Wulcan
skillTree.description: Wulcan may not be the fastest among his peers, his teeth appear uncannily sharp and his eyes have a remarkably yellow glow.

skillTree.name: Wolf's Backing
skillTree.description: Banners and equipment of Middenland you say? Among the secessionists cargo? Surely this all one big misunderstanding.. Or is it. Whatever it is, not all provinces are happy with the rebellion.

skillTree.name: Impregnable Bastille
skillTree.description: It is rumoured Fort Helmgart has never fallen to assault as long as Hans Frankenwurter lingered behind it's tall walls. Others discard this myth, or attribute this fact to times of peace.

skillTree.name: Man the Walls!
skillTree.description: Men, to the walls! These pretenders will never breach the mighty walls of Helmgart. These towers can withstand men, beast, elf and undead a like.

skillTree.name: Herald of Helmgart
skillTree.description: Many fear the prospect of an enemy siege, for Hans however - It is like Festtag.

effects.description:
Defensive supplies: +350 per turn when under siege
	(local region)

Reload time reduction: +10% when under siege
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: ''Borrowed'' Armour
skillTree.description: One could easily forget the importance of good equipment, Sigmar knows we won't. Too bad Karl's boys left some lying around. Too bad for them, atleast.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Frankenwurter's Company
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 for Frankenwurter's Company
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Frankenwurter's Company
skillTree.description: Do you call that wielding a Halberd? You could not even stop an infant squig! We will never beat that imposter Karl Franz with just this rabble alone. To Ubersreik! We need more men.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Frankenwurter's Company
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Frankenwurter's Company
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +12 for Frankenwurter's Company
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fortress Administrator
skillTree.description: Why govern towns and cities if you can hide behind the tall walls of forts? Who needs a bathhouse if you have a barracks?

effects.description:
Construction cost -20% for Empire Forts
	(all provinces)

Construction cost -30% for Empire Forts
	(all provinces)

Construction cost -40% for Empire Forts
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Stalwart Defender
skillTree.description: Hans has seen many of beasts, knights and greenskins come from the other side of the mountain pass. Few have passed, more did not.

skillTree.name: Elector-Count Frankenwurter?
skillTree.description: We've made it this far, rally, men! They will call me emperor soon enough.. SUMMON THE.. Uh.. Lords?!

skillTree.name: Margrave Mackensen
skillTree.description: The former Margrave of Helmgart, Reinhardt von Mackensen, was famously known for his markmanship with a rifle. His regiment, the Mackensen's Marauders still guard the tall walls of this fort. They not only pass on the name, so to the deadly precision with a handgun.

effects.description:
Missile Damage: +10% for Mackensen's Marauders
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Emperor's Finest
skillTree.description: â€œWe march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.â€

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed of Horse
skillTree.description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Reiksguard, Sons of Manann and all Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Reiksguard, Sons of Manann and all Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pistolkorps
skillTree.description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honest Steel
skillTree.description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mighty Forge
skillTree.description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

effects.description:
Ward save: 7% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 11% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 15% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Gunnery
skillTree.description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Strength of Hardship
skillTree.description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sharpshooter
skillTree.description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Taste for Battle
skillTree.description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)

Physical resistance: 10% for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Artillery Master
skillTree.description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh, Landship and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Leader of Renown
skillTree.description: Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible
skillTree.description: It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Headhunter
skillTree.description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

backgroundSkills.name: Sucessionist of Helmgart
backgroundSkills.description: Lord Frankenwurter, you have the blessing of the wolf for your honorable cause. But know this: If you strike a king - kill a king.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -75% while garrisoned in Fort Helmgart
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 while garrisoned in Fort Helmgart
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for towers during siege battles
	(Lord's army)

items.name: Reindert van Haagen
items.description: In order to stand any chance in political intrigue driven nation known as the Empire, one needs friends in high places. The Western-Provinces, especially Middenland and Marienburg, seem more susceptible to the idea of a change in power, but one does not easily gain audience with the Directorate of Marienburg. Besides being a sturdy Fortresss, Helmgart is also a trade hub for the Gery Mountains. A frequent patron is Reindert van Haagen, a member of one of the ten greatest Merchant Houses of Marienburg. In truth, the Van Haagen family has many debts. Perhaps this grants an opportunity to enlist Reindert and use his family name to gain a foothold in Marienburg.

items.name: Grey Mountain's Aegis
items.description: Bejeweled with gems found deep within the Grey Mountains, this Halberd is passed on from Lord-Commander to Lord-Commander. Upon accepting the title to rule Helmgart, Hans Frankenwurter ordered the Halberd to be engraved with the skull of a young Bretonnian noble from Montfort, who had ambition to expand his hamlet. Unfortunate for the noble he was quick to learn steeds don't climb walls. A lesson he paid for with his life.

factionEffects.title: Empire Secessionists
factionEffects.description: Fort-Commander Frankenwurter leads a rebellion against the coronated Karl Franz
